name: collabquest
description: A comprehensive collaborative coding platform with real-time collaboration, competitive programming, and educational features

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:client
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:server && npm run lint:fix:client
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ../executor && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run clean:server && npm run clean:client
scripts.clean:server: cd server && rm -rf node_modules dist build
scripts.seed: cd server && npm run seed:dsa && npm run seed:quiz
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:env

author: Aman <iamaman2901@gmail.com>
